message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair starting point considering its potential. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I can come down to $1,100,000. This price reflects the true worth and potential this product holds.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $950,000 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I don't want to go above this amount. I'd love to hear if you can meet me in the middle.
